title: Is Moderna Tied to Fauci, Gates, Soros, and Epstein?
subtitle: A spoof omnibus conspiracy theory linked a company developing a potential COVID-19 vaccine to several prominent figures.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Viral text accurately outlines how biotechnology company Moderna is linked to Dr. Anthony Fauci, Bill Gates, George Soros, and Jeffrey Epstein.
